subject: Self Care
title: Deep Sleep: The Repair Shift
description: A short lesson to help you apply Deep Sleep: The Repair Shift.

hook.text: A bodybuilder can train for hours, but muscles only grow during deep sleep. The gym is just the trigger.

buildup.text: Deep sleep floods the body with growth hormone. Cells regenerate, bones strengthen, immunity reboots.

discovery.text: The glymphatic system activates during deep sleep, flushing toxic waste from brain tissue overnight.

twist.text: Alcohol and sleeping pills may knock you out, but they suppress deep sleep almost completely.

climax.text: Protecting your deep sleep is more important than total hours. Quality beats quantity every time.

punchline.text: Deep sleep is when your body rebuilds itself.

quiz.question: What does the glymphatic system do during deep sleep?
options: Flushes toxic waste from brain tissue
